Weapon (Whip), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)
This magical whip resembles the fleshy tail of a full‑grown rat. You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a hit, the whip wraps itself neatly around a creature’s throat. For living, breathing creatures, this immediately engages suffocation. The creature is also restrained and takes 1d8 psychic damage per round while suffocating. (Constructs, undead, plants, and creatures of size Large or greater are unaffected). On its turn, the target can make a DC 15 Strength check to cut or remove the whip, ending all effects.
